import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './Sidebar.css' import logo from './images/logo.png' import usericon from './images/usericon.png' import usersVerification from '../images/userverification.png' import usermembership from '../images/usermember.png' import update from './images/update.png' import block from './images/block.png' import admin from './images/admin.png' import logout from './images/logout.png' import Users from './Users' const Sidebar = () => { const [height, setHeight] = useState(window.innerHeight * 1); useEffect(() => { const handleResize = () => { setHeight(window.innerHeight * 1); // Adjust the multiplier as needed }; window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize); return () => { window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize); }; }, []); return ( <>

) } export default Sidebar
